mapper.insert: insert into freeboard values (freeboard_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, freeboard_seq.currval, #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth})
mapper.update: update freeboard set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, reg_date=sysdate where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, F.* from (select * from freeboard order by num desc) F) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.update: update freeboard set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
